products.name: Deco
products.content:
inner tie fastens at wearer's right, outer tie at wearer's left
bias cut 100% silk charmeuse, 100% nylon leavers lace, dry clean only
delicate baby hem and french seams
Made in the USA
Layla L'obatti - Specimens of Seduction TM
products.introduce:
On Sale 20% off - Only a few left!
If diamonds are a girl's best friend, you'll win hearts, diamonds, and more in this stunning satin and lace robe. Here's betting you'll find this the perfect piece to pack for a romantic getaway or even for lounging around on a night in.
100% silk
Made in the USA

products.name: Arabesque Wrap Robe Gown Lagoon silk
products.content:
100% silk and hand dyed/hand cut & appliqu�d lace
Matte charmeuse outer, satin finish against skin
Silk satin binding at back opening, along neck/front
Delicate french seams and baby hem
Inverted box pleat with satin outer in contrast with matte body (for those meaningful exits)
Double tie with side slit and outer loop allow for easy adjustable fit/sizing
Dry clean
products.introduce:
You see, but what are you really seeing? The mirage, the tease, the blur... the feeling that what you want is just out of reach. This is essence of temptation and the spark that lights the fires of love - let the sparks fly with Arabesque.
Mastering deshabille, a state of undress, can be an art. This elegant midnight blue wrap dressing gown would be the paint, inky blue silk charmeuse cascades over curves, with an alluring peek a boo back slit, and cutaway lace applique at each shoulder- making your blue period a work of art worth remembering.

products.name: FINAL SALE Curtain Call Crop Sweatshirt Pink
products.content:
All colors display some degree of heathering from multiple yarns used, effect is more pronounced on charcoal, heather grey, oatmeal
Ribbon drawstring tie at waist lets you cinch a line silhouette
Front pocket with openings and room for both hands
Avoid jewelry that may snag fabric
Avoid washing with items that may snag fabric during wash
Machine wash cold with like colors
Do Not Bleach, No tumble dry. Flat/line dry. No Iron, Steam ok.
87% polyester, 9% rayon, 4% spandex
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection
products.introduce:
Only 3 left! Now 50% off, originally $80. This item is FINAL SALE
Curtain Call crop sweatshirt, a 70's throwback with modern styling, goes from workout to play. Made from super soft terry knit - the pullover style sweatshirt has fitted dolman cap sleeves and a- line silhouette. Jersey on one side terry on the back, the reverse terry details create a two-tone effect on details like collar, sleeves, front pocket, hem.
Style it with track pants or joggers from Curtain Call or Make a Pass for a full look or pair it with some high waisted bell bottoms or some leggings and leg warmers for scene stealing look a la Flash Dance.
Made in the USA

products.name: Matchplay Lounge Pant Navy SIGNATURE
products.content:
Wash and Dry on delicate cycle with like colors, Hang or Flat Dry. Steam press, use press cloth to avoid damaging spandex
body: 95% rayon, 5% spandex
Made in the USA
Between the Sheets Collection
*Model is 5' 11" wearing size small
the silhouette is slightly updated version of our Well Played lounge pant, with slightly more room in thighs and wider waistband.
products.introduce:
Sold out sizes are out of stock through early 2021, we will update our social media/email list when we are able to restock.
Slumber party, run to the corner store, or lazy weekend in bed - find your perfect go-to lounge pant in our new range, Matchplay. In the most heavenly soft and comfortable jersey knit it will be hard to get you out of this slinky soft pant.
Fall in love with little details like the wide elastic-free waistband, the figure flattering slim leg silhouette, or the delicate petersham ribbon tie. This could be love, or just a match made in lounge heaven.
Made in the USA

products.name: Official Yarn Dyed Oversized Stripe
products.content:
We hope you are satisfied with all of your purchases but if you ever need to return an item, you can do so within 28 days from the date of delivery.
For hygiene reason, once the seal has been opened on fashion face masks, cosmetics or pierced jewellery, these items can no longer be returned. We please ask you try on swimwear and lingerie over your own underwear and ensure to keep the seal intact.
products.introduce:
100% Cotton, Model Is 6'1" And Wears A Size M
T-shirts and vests are the power players in every man’s wardrobe
This season the dream team in male dressing gets daring with t-shirts and vests taking on poppin’ paisley prints and sporty slogans to keep you enviably on-trend. Vests come in versatile block colours for building your perfect look and polos in polished prints, while back to nature animal motifs are the new trend to try. Pair your printed tee with skinny jeans and suede desert boots to take you from day to night in style.
